languages.title: Languages
list: English - professional level in writing and speaking

profile.title: Professional profile
profile.introduction: Curious and passionate Web Developer with more than 5 years of experience in the design and development of web projects. Adept of functional programming and the KISS principle, I like the code to be well structured, clear and commented. Reactive and with a strong team spirit, my help is often appreciated to solve complicated problems or to take on new challenges.

experiences.title: Web developer at Botfuel
details: Development and maintenance of an ecosystem of customer support applications, including a backoffice using an API rest, an intelligent chat module, a dynamic FAQ display module and a server for the chat and FAQ module. The technologies used for these applications are React, Axios, Socket.io, Semantic UI and Styled components, Node.js, Redis, TypeScript.
Deployment of various applications on Heroku and AWS using CI/CD pipelines.
Design and development of Botfuel Dialog, an open source SDK for developing chatbots in Node.js.
Implementation of the Botfuel Dialog SDK as a web application usable by everyone.
Maintenance and translation of the company's website developed with Gatsby.js and PHP.
Development of features and maintenance of a chatbot client project in coffeescript.
Development of a proxy in Node.js allowing the public, secure and unified use of the different APIs of the company.
Development of modules integrating the company customer support solution on Magento, Wordpress and Shopify websites.

experiences.title: Web developer at Botfuel
details: Development of a question/answer bot interface connected to an API rest, with React and Redux.
Various developments in Node.js, Angular, React, Python and Grav.

experiences.title: Web developer at Coursierprivé.com
details: Development of features on the Dashboard and migration to the V2 dashboard.
Worked with AngularJS, Java, Vert.x, MongoDB and git.

experiences.title: Web developer at Webcentric
details: Bug fixing and feature development on the computer maintenance solution FanaticalHelp.
Worked with PHP, MySQL, POO, JS, Ajax, DoT.js and git.

experiences.title: Web development projects
details: Participation in the development of 6 website projects.
Worked with PHP, MySQL, Wordpress, Symfony, JS, JQuery and Ajax.
